  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(Corner[] corners, int basePoint, Condition condition, Integer[] cost, Symbols requiredItem)
      Builds the front of the gold cards with corners, points and the card's cost.
      Parameters:
      corners - corners of the card.
      basePoint - points written on the card.
      condition - condition (if present) to fulfill to calculate points. For example 1 point for every visible quill.
      cost - represents the cost, in terms of symbols, necessary to place the card.
      requiredItem - the item needed for the ITEM condition.

  • Method Details

    • checkCost

      public boolean checkCost(Player player)
      Description copied from class: Face
      Check if the player can afford the face's cost.
      Overrides:
      checkCost in class Face
      Parameters:
      player - player to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the face has no cost or the player can afford it.

    • calcPoints

      public void calcPoints(Player player, Card card)
      Description copied from class: Face
      Calculate the points of the face when a card is placed on it and adds them to the player's score.
      Overrides:
      calcPoints in class Face
      Parameters:
      player - player whose score is being calculated.
      card - card which points are calculated.
